Forget your ID or password? | Help

Need help signing in to Yahoo!?

  • Enter the text you see in the picture.

    To ensure the security of your account we require you to complete this sign-in verification after five failed attempts to sign in.

  • Is the "Caps Lock" or "A" light on your keyboard on?

    If so, hit "Caps Lock" key before trying again.

  • Did you forget or misspell your ID or password?

    You can recover your ID and/or password by confirming your private information.

  • Still having trouble?

    Try sign-in help.
